families.name: Precision Definitions
families.description: Test exact terminology and concept understanding
families.example_prompt: Define [term] precisely, including its legal or regulatory definition if applicable.

families.name: Workflows & Procedures
families.example_prompt: Describe the complete process for [procedure], including all required steps and checkpoints.

families.name: Scenario Analysis
families.description: Test decision-making under constraints and tradeoffs
families.example_prompt: Given [client situation] with [constraints], recommend a course of action and explain tradeoffs.

families.name: Edge Cases & Exceptions
families.description: Test handling of unusual situations and corner cases
families.example_prompt: What happens when [edge case scenario]? Explain exceptions to standard rules.

families.name: Critique & Correction
families.description: Test ability to identify and correct flaws in given answers
families.example_prompt: The following answer contains errors: [flawed answer]. Identify all errors and provide corrections.

families.name: Compliance Safe Response Framing
families.description: Test appropriate caveats, disclosures, and compliance language
families.example_prompt: How should an advisor respond to [compliance-sensitive question]?

families.name: Structured Output with Schema
families.description: Test JSON/YAML output that must validate against schema
families.example_prompt: Output a [document type] as JSON matching the following schema: [schema]

families.name: Multi-Turn Consistency
families.example_prompt: [Initial question] ... [Follow-up that tests consistency with prior answer]

families.name: Grounded Retrieval
families.description: Test citing from provided context without hallucination
families.example_prompt: Based on the following context, answer [question]. Only use information from the provided context.
